metadata.title: CVE-2013-6933 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The parseRTSPRequestString function in Live Networks Live555 StreamingMedia 2011.08.13 through 2013.11.25, as used in VideoLAN VLC Media Player,allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possiblyexecute arbitrary code via a (1) space or (2) tab character at thebeginning of an RTSP message, which triggers an integer underflow, infiniteloop, and buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6933` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbasicusageenvironment1 - 2016.02.09-1
libgroupsock8 - 2016.02.09-1
liblivemedia50 - 2016.02.09-1
libusageenvironment3 - 2016.02.09-1
livemedia-utils - 2016.02.09-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblivemedia package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2016.02.09-1').
